item.title: Markdown Cheatsheet
item.description: Different ways to highlight text Italics Bold A little bit weird mix Line above it ### Different ways to highlight text + *Italics* + **Bold** + ***A* little bit _weird_** _mix_ + ~~Line above it~~Ways to create [links] Link to Google Link to Google, but when you hover your mouse avobe the link a text will show up Links with references: Text reference to Reddit Numerical reference to Reddit The text itself its the reference to the link Twitter pictures ### Ways to create [links] 1.

item.title: Shortcode
item.description: Attachments Sample files mtga.txt (25 B) otaku.txt (13 B) Badges Pirate King Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika Buttons Home Expand Menos Hello Hightlights ​ c++ 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main(){ cout << "Hello world"; return 0; } Icons https://fontawesome.com/v5/search?m=free Include Este texto es el que está dentro del fichero include Math $$\left( \sum_{k=1}^n a_k b_k \right)^2 \leq \left( \sum_{k=1}^n a_k^2 \right) \left( \sum_{k=1}^n b_k^2 \right)$$ Mermaid %%{init:{"fontFamily":"monospace", "sequence":{"showSequenceNumbers":true}}}%% sequenceDiagram Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
